deptsql:
SELECT	WUBI_CODE,
UPDATE_USER,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_FLAG,
SUPERIOR_DEPT_NAME,
SUPERIOR_DEPT_CODE,
SUBOR_HOSPITAL_DISTRICT,
RECORD_DATE,
PINYIN_CODE,
OI_DEPT_FLAG,
MS_DEPT_FLAG,
INVALID_FLAG,
DEPT_NAME,
DEPT_CODE,
DEPT_CATEG_NAME,
DEPT_CATEG_CODE,
CLINIC_DEPT_FLAG,
LOCATION,
IS_WARD  FROM PS02004_VIEW_1 where superior_dept_name='党群部门'
rysql: SELECT  tk.KSBM,tk.KSMC,tk.PYJM FROM dbo.TJ_KSDM AS tk WHERE tk.KSBM=21
bqsql: SELECT  tk.KSBM,tk.KSMC,tk.PYJM FROM dbo.TJ_KSDM AS tk WHERE tk.KSBM=21
